law.catch_line: Deduction From Net Income For Compensation Paid To Individuals Employed By Eligible Business Facility Domiciled In Present Or Former Eligible Section Of Substantial Poverty

text.section: domiciled in an eligible section of substantial poverty as defined in section eleven of chapter twenty-three B; or

domiciled in an area which had been certified as such an eligible section of substantial poverty when the corporation first received a certificate of eligibility; provided, however, such individuals still live in the same city or town;
